snippet.title: Xecryst Remains - v0.95.0 Game Play Trailer (Private Version Trailer)
snippet.description:
Xecryst Remains is an Objective-Based Party-Based Third-Personal Action-RPG "Overworld Striders". Fight through a randomized handcrafted stage with a freeform Action-RPG mechanic. Set in the world which government by Xecryst energy called the Abstract. The source of economy, technology, magic, and world functionality. Be one of the mercenaries to suppress and searching for an ongoing cataclysm from Xecryst imbalances.

Free game running by donation money only. No microtransaction, no time gating nor over-grinding. Good for both long and short play like in the night games or coffee breaks.

Currently, on a test-build that accessible on $1+ Patreon tier. Will be re-released on Steam and Itch.io later when the game is done.

Discord: https://discord.gg/UaZxxFyr9y
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/XecrystRemains/
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/xecrystremains
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/510000/Xecryst_Remains/
Itch.io: https://kryslequinsen.itch.io/xecryst-remains
